resources.string: If you answer all 10 questions correctly you will win the prize money of one Crore.
If you answer any question incorrectly then you will be eliminated from the game
You have to answer 10 questions ,each question has four options
You will given two lifelines 1)50:50-If you use this life line then two incorrect choices will be removed\n2)DoubleDip:If you use this lifeline then you are able to make two guesses for a question
